name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Cassette Girl
description: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Cassette Girl is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Cassette Girl character, an upcoming character for Friday Night Funkin'. The mod puts the development teams original take onto the upcoming character, featuring a full week of content and an additional 2 extra bonus songs.

name: Otome Chat Connection
description: Otome Chat Connection is a game made by SEEC, featuring text conversations with different characters.

name: April Was A Fool
description:
Two years ago, six heroes triumphed over the evil Overlord. Which is great! Except that a new evil force has risen and wants to conquer the world once again: Evil. The king of the land decided to summoned the six heroes to fight it…

…But their leader, April, is dead and with her the spirit of the Team. No one has the heart to tell him what happen to her but at the same time has to see him before going on their journey. That where May (the MC) comes in: thanks to her uncanny ressemblance with April, they deceived the king and can go on adventure to defeat Evil!

Of course, the story doesn’t stop here, as May Jumped at the Call to accompany the World Class Heroes… And maybe, have a smooch with one of them. Maybe. Mainly because everybody is an idiot and things can get really dark at times.

name: Summer's Gone: Season 1
description:
Summer's Gone is a story-focused Visual Novel with adult elements, in which you'll play a young man that is fighting with uncertainty, depression, and the troubles daily life can throw at you.

The game involves topics like mental health, depression, disability and coping with various life situations when everything seems dull.

While the game features some rather heavy topics, the game's central topic is 'Healing'. Overcoming what life throws at you.

Forming bonds.

name: SpinOff
description:
"SpinOff" (aka "3D Spinner") is a physics-based puzzle game where the player has to guide a wooden marble to the target area of a level in the shortest possible time. The marble is only indirectly controlled by tilting the level with the mouse to make it move in that direction, taking inertia into account.

There are 14 levels in total, with most of them containing hazards such as holes, ice, fire, glue, or dangerous creatures. In addition to items that need to be collected on the way, some levels require the use of teleporters or special items that add features like different size and transparency.

The levels are timed but there is no time limit to complete them.

name: Homura Hime
description: "Homura Hime" is a third person action game, featuring Japanese anime visuals and intense 3D bullet curtain gameplay. Alongside Homurahime, fight against Demon Girls possessed by deviant "emotions", and get closer to discovering the truth of not only the fallen, but also your own veiled legacy.

name: The Crazy Journalist
description: Collect coins as the crazy journalist is trying to chase you for an interview.

name: Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe
description: Reborn in a fantasy world you have chosen to open a Japanese-style family restaurant. Instead of buying ingredients, you spend your money rescuing 2 animal-eared girls from a disgusting slaver! Enjoy a heartwarming story of blossoming romance at the Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe.

name: GnollHack
description: GnollHack is a NetHack variant that adds to the game animated graphics, spatial sounds, and voice overs, among other things. The current, modern version is available on Android and iOS. Old versions are available on Windows and Linux.

name: Gulman 3D
description: Gulman 3D is a Russian Third-Face Shooter game developed and published by and Svyatoslav Gundyaev back in 2008. The game is known for being one of the worst game of all time.

name: Humans vs. Vampires
description: Based off of the movie and tv series “My Babysitter’s A Vampire”

name: Park After Dark
description:
Park After Dark is is an erotic parody game created as a hobby by fans for fans

When you are granted a magic pen with the ability to rewrite reality, you immediately begin creating your very own theme park...and filling it with sexy princesses!
Manage your time between visiting the girls and growing your park!

name: Goose Simulator
description:
Goose Simulator Brings you the stupidest gameplay you've ever seen. 100s of bugs that are funny as hell, the worst physics you've ever seen, and the dumbest, most hilarious Story Mode You Have Ever Seen.

Have you ever wanted to roam around a Cartoon City and shoot things, blow shit up and go flying through the air at uncontrollable speeds? Well, you are in for a treat because that is what Goose Simulator is all about! Worst game of physics ever, got em. 100s of Dumb ass glitches, got em. Hilariously Stupid Story mode, got it. Jump into Goose Sim This Summer and Laugh Your Ass Off!

name: Mickey Mouse Murder House
description:
Mickey Mouse Murder House is a retro shooter taking inspiration from Doom and Wolfenstein 3D.

Clear areas full of evil clones of Donald Duck, His Cool Cousins and Peg Leg Pete's. At the last level of the game you will fight a Mega Peg-Leg-Pete to the death and restore the clubhouse!

name: Brutal Doom: Ali Jr's Challenge
description:
In order to survive this behemoth of Brutal Doom, you need high alertness, accuracy, cover, and a desire for adventure (to find secrets and assets). Without just one of those, you'll die several times.

This is the mod for everyone who craves (or simply wants) a hardcore version of brutal doom since it brings the intensity of Brutal Doom up to a 10 on a 1 point scale of badassery. If Project Brutality is like Brutal Doom on steroids, this version is like Brutal Doom on speed and crack cocaine.

Monsters are up to an extreme level of relentlessness. For instance, the zombies are more accurate, have faster fire rates, and fire faster tracers. Imps can throw up to four fireballs in a single charge and they have a flamethrower attack for close range combat, their balls also scorch the ground for a maximum insult to injury.

Barons and knights can sprint and jump at you, often reaching you sooner than you could imagine, and Barons can throw small BFG rounds at you. Archviles can summon monsters very fast and their fire-rape leaves continuous flames on the ground. I'll leave the Cyberdemons and Masterminds to your imagination since what they do is not pretty at all.

The good news is that the player is given many advantages. Unlike BD Redemption, where Doomguy is weakened to reality, both Doomguy and his enemies are tougher. Doomguy's attacks very efficiently with fast reloading, punching, shooting, and the assistance of an item store.

Some new weapons include the pistol, SMG, Auto-Shotgun, sniper-rifle, Dual-Chainsaws, and Cyberdemon's Rocket launcher (which is only available in the Heavy weapon class). Many weapons have a new tertiary fire; like adjusting the sniper scope, malt-rounds for the minigun, Rocket launcher grenade mode, and the dual wielding function was moved to the tertiary fire mode.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Der Magische Hexenkreis
description: In this game teenage witch Bibi navigates isometric levels to help out friends and family and flies her broom in 2D side-scrolling levels to fix the mess evil witch Malicia has caused in the city of Neustadt.

name: Super Mario 64: Through the Ages
description: SM64: Through the Ages is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 developed by Kaze Emanuar. It was made using the Super Mario 64 Decompilation Project. In this game, Mario travels through stages inspired by historical locations or periods. Also, Mario can now be accompanied by different Pokémon, each one with a different special ability.

name: Jimbob and the Magic Chain
description: A platformer game about chain warfare.

name: Romancing Flesh
description:
Romancing Flesh is a kinetic visual novel with the style of classic Universal Monster films, and the body horror schlock of direct-to-video scary movies!

Through audio recordings, letters, photos, and film, discover what drove Charles Keating from being a normal college graduate, to a mad scientist whose passions drove him to unethical experimentation, self mutilation, and forbidden love .

name: Quake: Underdark Overbright & Copper
description: Enjoy eight maps to barrel your way through in our re-release of the legendary shooter with the community-favorite mod Underdark Overbright, available to download now in the Add-on menu of Quake Remastered. This Add-on also includes Copper, adjusting the original game for a tweaked experience.

name: West Game
description: A war game set in the Wild West. Build up your town, train troops, research, attack and defend against other towns, capture buildings for boosts, participate in events, grow stronger with your alliance, and more.

name: Bacon: The Game
description:
Have you ever tried bacon on...
... ice cream?
... Piña Colada?
... the United States of America?

name: The Migrant
description:
Axion is an alien being who was exiled from his planet a long time ago.

Regretful for his actions, he now travels the universe in search of a new planet to live in peace.

Will Axion find a new home?
or succumb to the dangers of the unknown planets?

name: Msoids
description: Msoids is a shooter game based on the Asteroids formula. The player controls a small cannon which he can move around with the keyboard, using the mouse to blast the square asteroids which split into smaller ones when shot. When the cannon is hit by an asteroid, it's game over.

name: Retro II
description: Retro II is a scrolling shoot-em-up game.

name: Minubeat
description: Minubeat is a cross between a shoot-em-up and a rhythm game.

name: Illegal Communication
description: Illegal Communication is a short, surreal action game with minimalistic, vector-like graphics. The player controls a "defence orb", deployed in order to destroy an "illegal communication". The controls and rules aren't explained in the game, and the player is challenged to find everything out on his own.

name: Fuck Space!
description: Fuck Space! is a simple overhead shooter where you control your crafts movements with the directional arrows and shoot with Z. Your goal is to destroy as many space denizens as possible, be they small planets, alien cruisers, or giant skulls.

name: Life is a Race
description: Life is a Race is a simple game which metaphorically depicts the human life as a course to be run as fast as possible. The player must click the left mouse button rapidly to make the on-screen character rush forward while moving through all the life stages. The goal of the game is to get as low a time as possible.

name: 2Week: Death World
description: The world was filled with darkness. Gather supplies and people, build a wall, and defend yourself against the emissaries of the underworld! 2Week:DeathWorld is a side-scrolling strategy game drawn in dots.

name: The Asmodian Princesses and the Witch in the Forest
description: One day, Shoichi heard the call from a mysterious goddess. "Please come and take down the devil!" Although it sounds like a template, he still came to the "demon world". After meeting the two princesses and the king, he was made to make an "ultimate choice", and the legend of this young man began.

name: Maid Knight Alicia
description: Alicia is a female knight who has won many battles with her armor and sword. One day, a sorcerer she once let escape casts an curse of armor disablement on her. Now, only she can equip is a maid's uniform...

name: Yes My Lord
description: The protagonist was once a famous genius, but now he is poor. One day, he woke up drunk and found himself in an underground cemetery with demons wandering around. The mysterious girl "Foxy" who met in the cemetery taught him the necromancer magic.

name: Zion Survivors
description: Customize your ship. Defeat or escape from chase enemies. Destroy city walls. Drive your ship to machine city. Begin to believe.

name: The Dark Defender
description: The Dark Defender is a story driven adventure game where you play as a character who has been deserted, with no recollection of your past. With determination you make your way through a world with many friends to assist you on your journey, as well as enemies burdening your adventure.

name: Meteor Blasters
description: Meteor Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate the space rocks. Play 4 players Co-op or Versus Mode with friends.

name: Unlock the Feelings
description: Luck can be useful, but the more you improve your strategy, the less you depend on it. Unlock the Little Inner Monsters we all have, in this codebreaking strategy game inspired by Wordle and Mastermind. As you play it regularly, create your own diary of feelings and reflections.

name: MythBusters: The First Experiment
description: MythBusters: The First Experiment is a free introduction to the first-person creative simulator based on the legendary Discovery show. Learn how to run crazy experiments and manage the production of episodes. Take the first steps to become a MythBuster!

name: Death Cube
description: "Death Cube" is a 2D platformer where you need to cross a room full of obstacles to get to the exit.

name: Alcohol Empire
description: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents!

name: Operation Pill
description: Operation Pill is the story of a small and brave pill that gets into your body and saves it from pathogenic bacteria. Arm yourself with an electrostatic shield and a germicidal cannon and save your body!

name: Nuwe: First seeds
description: Adventure game with a spectacular design and innovative 2D, 3D platform mechanics. Located in a beautiful universe full of incredible creatures and landscapes.

name: Travel to GolemPark
description: A classic adventure quest, in the setting of an alternative future. Help the main character gather friends and go on a trip to the festival.

name: Frostbitten
description: Frostbitten takes you into the depths of a national park's snow-ridden forest; a place notorious for consuming those who enter. Through the eyes of a park ranger in this survival horror experience, discover the dark secrets that lie beyond the clearing…

name: Post Solis
description: Post Solis is a real-time sci-fi strategy game. Your only ally is a tiny ray of the sunlight. It moves across the planet, and you can only build in its area. Anything plunged into darkness is destroyed. The game is built around the key mechanics of following the slipping ray of light.

name: The Lost Mines
description: The Lost Mines is a remake of the first game I made for MSX computers. In this puzzle game, you must collect all the resources to advance to the next level, avoiding the guardian and fighting against the clock. Old style difficulty with remastered graphics and sound.

name: Ghost Haunt
description:
Ghost Haunt is a thrilling multiplayer horror game that pits players together as the Ghost Hunter or the Ghost or against the AI. Four brave Ghost Hunters face off against one cunning Ghost in a chilling battle for survival to capture them all! and learn from them.

The Ghost Hunters are equipped with an arsenal of paranormal equipment to track, identify, and banish the spectral adversary. They must work together, using communication and strategy to survive the haunting. The team's ultimate goal is to capture enough evidence to banish the Ghost before time runs out.

The Ghost, on the other hand, is a master of terror. Using a variety of supernatural abilities, the Ghost must terrorize and eliminate the Ghost Hunters one by one. The Ghost can possess objects, manipulate the environment, and even directly attack the Hunters. Victory for the Ghost means driving the Hunters to insanity or eliminating them all.

name: The Ultra Mission
description: The Ultra Mission is a shooting game where, on each of the eight levels, the protagonist must reach civilians to rescue them. Once all civilians on a level are rescued, the level is complete.

name: Our Ninja World
description: Take on our top-secret training games and transform into the ultimate ninja! Pass around Joy-con controllers and play with up to four players! We've got every tool a ninja needs: throwing stars, ninja swords, grappling hooks, and even flying squirrels!

name: Fly Cat
description: A cute kitty, platformer game!

name: Landing Hero: Haneda x 787
description: The stage is Haneda Airport, the largest airport in Japan and gateway to the sky. You are the pilot of the 787 and you are about to finish a long flight, your mission is to control and land the plane safely.

name: ABC Search With Me: Extended Edition
description: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way! Bundle includes the 'Extra Music Pack'.

name: Burger Chef Tycoon: Complete Edition
description: Like going out to town for a snack? Everybody does! But perhaps you'd like to see that from the other side? Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity! Manage the preparation of burgers, fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

name: Dadish 3
description: When his kids board a bus for a suspicious field trip, Dadish sets off to find them before they're turned into radish soup!

name: Kryzta
description: Kryzta is an experimental action game by Cactus. On the surface, it looks like an arena shooter, but you are unable to fire. Instead, the focus is on avoiding enemy shots and maneuvering in such a way that the enemy hit each other, instead of you.

name: Base Jump: Wing Suit Flying
description: Spread your wings and start flying like you’ve never been before! Base Jump Wing Suit Flying allows you to take part in awesome and exciting extreme sports. Use Wingsuit to jump and fly over multiple cool environments and beat your high scores!

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Chicken Edition: Splat Jaypak's Arenas
description: Join the party as they are trapped and captured by the sadistic owner of the Wheel of Misfortune, Splat Jaypak. If they want to get out, they will have to shape up and fight through every ordeal their captor can throw at them. Are you ready for battle?

name: Brotato
description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens.

name: Stallions in America
description: Stallions in America is an action game, where on each level the player, as one of the four gunmen called "Stallions", must massacre a crowd of people, bats and balloons on the loose in cities around the United States.

name: What Lies Between
description: Transported to a new world, jump and dash your way across the strange land to return home!

name: Bounters
description: Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game. Setup your loadout, fight, loot, take bounties, and exit the field to claim all loots and bounties you got!

name: Frequency Dissonance
description: Uncover all of the endings by listening to the radio frequencies while solving puzzles on a mysterious space outpost.

name: WooLoop
description: Wrap, weave, and wind your wool! Build works of art strand by strand, one loop at a time, in this tranquil game of craftsmanship. Draw inspiration from the large exhibition of levels available and unwind with the soothing soundtrack.

name: My Hotel
description: Restore a forgotten mansion, turn it into your own hotel and increase your reputation. From mopping the floor to hosting the most prestigious personalities. Do your best to beat the challenges, hire employees and earn more stars!

name: The Detroit After
description: You are a robot, you have to kill everyone...

name: Championship Wrestling Promoter
description: Book shows, build feuds, manage your finances, and win the TV ratings war in Championship Wrestling Promoter, a professional wrestling management strategy game.

name: Moon Runner
description: An atmospheric survival shooter set on a small moon. You are tasked with finding the monoliths across the lunar landscape and restarting the moon's infrastructure. Traverse the dangerous terrain and deal with enemy droids corrupted by an ominous presence below the surface...

name: Out of Sight
description: Your ship has been hi-jacked by a clever and aggressive alien space cult. Observe the enemy's behaviour and outwit them using stealth tactics and hi-tech gadgets. Plan your escape with a friend in co-op in this 2D top-down action-stealth game.

name: Rail Route: The Story of Jozic
description: A stand-alone prequel from the developers of Rail Route, The Story of Jozic thrusts players into the world of an apprentice train dispatcher in the bustling city of Prague, guided through the process of creating their first rail network by a mysterious mentor.

name: Townframe
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you recreate towns from people's memories. These people will give you written puzzles and to solve them you'll be able to either modify the buildings or use different tools, such as one that makes wind, and many others. Each puzzle will surprise you in a different way.

name: Aquatico
description: Aquatico is a survival city builder set deep beneath the waves. Choose your strategy, obtain resources, build your futuristic city and prove no challenge is too hard.

name: Fear the Spotlight
description: Fear the Spotlight is an atmospheric third-person horror adventure with a disturbing mystery to unravel. Sneak into school after hours with Vivian and Amy, survive a séance gone wrong, solve tactile puzzles, and, whatever you do, stay out of the spotlight…

name: Breaker's World
description: Upgrade your power armor, recruit a loyal crew, and build a spaceship to escape the oppressive management of a dystopian barren planet. Breaker's world features open-ended sci-fi RPG character development in a unique world full of rust, danger, and opportunity.

name: Pizza Possum
description: A game about a very hungry possum causing mayhem in a picturesque beach town.

name: Little Astronaut
description: A little astronaut in a huge danger. You are Sky, an engineer of the SBTC Science Bio Technology Corporation. You have one mission: explore what happened at the Mars Bioresearch Facility where all the communication was lost. You are only a little astronaut, but what you will find, is a huge danger.

name: Yours Truly
description: Yours Truly is an emotional 3rd person narrative-driven game with elements of exploration, puzzles, and platforming. Centered around Liam who is stranded in a strange world searching for his true self, and purpose while finding a way home.

name: Diptych: The Great War
description: A visual novel about the Great War with anthropomorphic animals in the continuation of the story of the game Diptych.

name: Survival: Fountain of Youth
description: Survival: Fountain of Youth is a challenging single-player survival game set up on a vast Caribbean archipelago. You play as a stranded 16th century sailor having to craft his way through the struggles of survival in order to unveil the mysteries of an ancient civilization and your own fate.

name: This is Infinity
description: This is Infinity is an abstract exploration/puzzle game, created in 36 hours for the Ludum Dare 16 competition.

name: It's Hard Being a Dog
description: IHBAD is a 2D roguelike, Hack N Slash platformer game where you play as a dog! Fight strange creatures and mighty mythical gods as you uncover your origin in this dark dystopian world.

name: Cupid Kiss
description: Use your logical thinking to help the couple slide their way to find each other in this relaxing and innovative puzzle. Just be careful not to let any imp get in the way of love.

name: Times Table Hunt
description: A funny game for kids to learn and practice the times tables

name: Elementals: Calm Skies
description: Elementals: Calm Skies is a fast turn-based dungeon crawling game.

name: Krebswelte
description: Krebswelte is a game, created as an entry into TIGSource's "Procedural Generation" competition. The player controls a mercenary who, on each level, must find a key and make his way to the exit. Each level is a random, chaotic assortment of squares; the mercenary can move around thanks to his incredible jumping abilities, and his gun which allows him to destroy walls. A gun has unlimited ammo, but it takes a while to reload when its clip runs out. Destroyed wall sections re-appear after a while.

name: Precision
description: Precision is a freeware side scroller about precision jumping. The player has to jump from rooftop to rooftop (collecting all the beer bottles on the way) and reach the ladder, marking the end of the level. There are a total of 7 levels.

name: Clockwork Kingdom
description: 1-bit dungeon crawler

name: Ripit Hook
description: Custom Data East (92) Hook Pinball game.

name: Moonleap
description: In search of a more beautiful night, the moon child descends to retrieve some shooting stars.

name: Monster Toons
description: Monster Toons crashes onto the scene with a monster invasion. These mischievous marauders may be cute, but they're also destructive! Calm down the charming creatures before they turn Multland upside-down. Match your way to success with 100 unique Match 3 levels illustrated in a charming cartoon style. Enter the colorful world of Monster Toons today!

name: Macabre Ring: Amalia's Story
description: In Macabre Ring: Amalia's Story, the corpse of a girl is found inside an abandoned prison. The victim's name is Amalia, and a note next to the body points the finger at two police agents. But the suspects are innocent! Not all is as it seems in this haunting hybrid Hidden Object game. Help clear the cops' names and find the real murderer.

name: BlockOn!
description: BlockOn! is a platform game in which you have to collect all the red items, at which point the exit door will open and you can proceed to the next level. However, there is a serious twist - You have to create the levels yourself!

name: Xoldiers
description: Xoldiers is a shooting game where, leading a team of nine "xoldiers", the player's goal on each level is to get past the enemy defenses--cannons and tanks that shoot occasionally, garages that release instantly-killing trucks, and barracks that spit out endless waves of enemy infantry--and destroy all the enemy bases.

name: Ping Pong!
description: Ping Pong! is a simulation of table tennis, with one-player and two-player mode. In one-player mode, the player takes on four ping pong champs in a row; the two-player mode allows a single match. There are five different hits, which subtly change the speed and trajectory of the ball. Hitting the ball seven times in a row allows you to execute a "super smash".

name: Protoganda II
description: Protoganda II is a shoot 'em up game and a sequel to Protoganda: Strings, with retro-styled graphics. The player controls a small spaceship which faces a number of powerful battleships, one by one. Each enemy ship keeps rapidly changing its shape and rearranging its elements, all while firing relentlessly. The player must shoot off parts of the enemy ship while avoiding enemy gunfire and flying debris.

name: Gamma IV
description: Gamma IV plays like the laser show of a Daft Punk concert, with electro-heavy beats and a pulsing spectrum of coloured beams, similar to the waves of audio visualization applications. The game is split up in different scenes with progressive difficulty and a single music track in the background, bridging all scenes.

name: Retro 4
description: Retro 4 is a simple shooter game. The player controls a circle that can move around the screen by using the WSAD keys. Clicking the left mouse button fires a bullet towards the mouse-controlled crosshair. The bullets are used to destroy colorful rectangles that float through the screen towards the circle. The bullets are drawn towards the rectangles, as if through force of gravity. By clicking the right mouse button, the circle releases a large amount of bullets in all directions. If a rectangle runs into the circle, it's game over.

name: Brutal Doom: Overpowered
description: OP version of Brutal Doom with most weapons infused with steroids and supplements. Have fun.

name: Arcade Archives: Youkai Douchuki
description: "Youkai Douchuki" is a side-scrolling action where players control "Tarosuke", a mischievous, playful boy who always troubled his village with pranks.

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Expansion Events
description: Sin descripción

name: Layer Section & Galactic Attack: S-Tribute
description: The vertical shooting game with gorgeous 2D animations and lock-on lasers is back with new features and online ranking!

name: Vico 2: Save the Children
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice Hockey: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Alienzix
description: Sin descripción

name: Burger Break: Head to Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Gaplus
description: Strike back with powerful Blaster Head weapons!

name: Injection π23: Ars Regia
description:
Survival horror is back.

Can you escape from this spiral of paranoia and madness to find your happiness again?

name: Breakout Bricks
description:
Breakout come back in this modernized top-of-the-art version.

Enjoy hours of pure fun with this classic break the bricks game. Enjoy the enhanced version with today device capabilities and revive the gameplay simple yet addictive of first generation video-games.

Collectable power-ups; multi-balls, fireballs make this version like no others.

Show off your skills and complete the increasingly challenging levels.

It's time for you to break a few walls!

name: This War of Mine: Final Cut
description: This War of Mine: Final Cut contains all the updates and free expansions released so far and introduces not only a new scenario but also expands all scenarios with the locations known from Stories DLCs - even if you don't own those. In short words - that means you can now experience lots of never-seen-before playthroughs and struggle with new challenges.

name: Beautiful Ukraine
description: Experience the beauty of Ukraine as it was and as it one day will be again.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Fish Tornado
description: A simple action game that all you need is your Left Stick! Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!

name: Arise: A Simple Story - Definitive Edition
description: Your adventure of love and loss.

name: Derby Racing: Xtreme Driver
description: Feel the action of real derby in the survival race!

name: Rail Trail
description: Rail Trail is a game where you need to create rail systems that will guide gold to its destination.

name: Ping Pong Arcade
description: Paddles at the ready!

name: Ludo Game: Just Chill Out!
description: Classic board game

name: Amazin' George Remastered
description: Guide George home through a expansive maze world with fun abilities, tricks and challenges along the way! George is a fun game for all ages. Do you have what it takes to escape the maze?

name: Farm Tycoon
description:
Manage your own farm in the tycoon game tailored specifically for Nintendo Switch!

From seeds to vegetables and processed products. There are animals, meat processing plants, farming machines, workers with different skill sets, warehouses with cooling, anti-pesticides, and many more. A lot of different strategies can be successfully executed to make the farm profitable. You can surely make a jack-of-all-trades farm to min-max the systems, but perhaps just a fully sustainable and independent apple juice company can drive the prices up and be more profitable? Maybe using only eco-friendly energy sources will pay off in the long run, especially with the government grant? Or you just *love* beef steaks and want to make the best quality filet mignon in the world? Any farm-related business idea seems possible in Farm Tycoon!

It’s the first game of its kind made with consoles in mind from the ground up. The whole user interface is tailored to sticks and buttons, without the usual hassle of virtual cursors present in the genre. Moreover, the 2XD Rendering technology, developed specifically for optimal Nintendo Switch experience, brings stunning visual effects while ensuring stable performance throughout the game.

name: Deadcraft
description: Farm the dead to stay alive in Deadcraft, a new twist on the zombie survival-action genre! As a half-zombie, grow an army of loyal undead followers and build an arsenal to equip them to take revenge on the rulers of humanity's last city.

name: The Future You've Been Dreaming Of
description:
Take on the role of a Zashiki-Warashi, a house-bound spirit that can bring good fortune, and peer into Sachi's life. You'll see some of her more vulnerable moments and have no choice but to intervene from time to time, but it's all to guide her toward a bright future!

Give her direction while she's at home and help her grow her parameters in all kinds of ways. Your guidance will determine the future she ultimately heads toward. There are 20 total paths awaiting Sachi, and it's up to you to help her find them!

name: Vesper: Zero Light Edition
description:
Thousands of years after the activation of the Vesper Protocol, a small android crosses a fallen world, hunted by merciless machines, to control the power of Light.

Vesper is a visionary adventure taking place in a decaying world full of puzzles and mysteries to uncover, where your choices will change the future of an entire race.

Seven is a small android, lost on an eerie planet full of perils and traces of an ancient civilization - with no powers and no ability to defeat enemies until he finds the Drive Gun, a weapon used to absorb lights, create darkness, and control minds.

name: Connecto
description: A fun and relaxing puzzle game about combining colorful dots together into groups.

name: War Mines Collection
description: The Allies need your help!

name: Best Month Ever!
description: Join Louise in the 1960s USA and secure the future of her son Mitch.

name: Car Parking Simulator
description: Drift and Park in Amazing Cars! Maneuver long Buses and make Freight Truck Deliveries! Show your Parking and Driving Skills in 50 Epic Missions at the Multi-Level Parking Lot!

name: Soft Drift
description: Soft Drift is a Speed Based Car Drift Game with Simple and Soft Graphics.

name: Gems of Magic: Dwarf's Destiny
description: Embark on an enchanting adventure to find your destiny by rebuilding the forest village and fend off the goblins in this exciting Match 3 adventure!

name: Scaredom
description: Scaredom is a 2D, fast-paced action-adventure platformer where you play as a Nightmare going to war against the army of Dreams. Explore surreal worlds, meet bizarre, fearsome characters and use your Nightmare powers to ruthlessly slaughter your enemies.

name: Lumote: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the game and the following: Original Soundtrack. Squish, bop and bounce through the world around you. Lumote is extremely curious, highly inquisitive and adorable!

name: Sonic Origins: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Relive the classic collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD in this remastered Deluxe Edition, featuring bonus digital content.

name: Stench Mechanics
description:
This is a small adventure game, made by cactus, for the No More Sweden indie party/competition.
The adventure takes place on a spaceship that is fueled by a pink gas that smells incredibly bad. You play as Mary, a less-than-happy crewmember who can't wait to get home.

name: Silent Chain
description:
In Silent Chain, the player is in a liquid environment with bubbles moving across the screen. Connect a bubble to you; if several bubbles are connected, they are joined together by a thin line, and can be drawn closer to each other with the X key.
Keep all your bubbles from being popped or shrinking to win the game!

name: Space Fuck!
description:
A father gives his son a space suit on his deathbed. Using the associated jet-pack the son ascends from the subterranean tunnel system he has always known as home. On the planet's surface he discovers a metropolis in ruins, and a sole survivor who tells him, "Planet "X" did this."
Leaping in a nearby legged tank, he takes to the sky. All of this the player is able to control by using the arrow keys, several other keys are used to operate the space craft which can shoot and transform between a walking and flying form.

name: Deep/Wing/Break
description: Deep/Wing/Break is a vertically scrolling shooter game where the player controls a grey, winged creature, carrying a tiny dot it must protect from waves of enemies, all of which shoot bullets in specific formations.

name: Omiai Commando: Bakappuru ni Tsukkomi wo
description: Omiai Commando: Bakappuru ni Tukkomi wo is a simulation game intended to marry couples. Set up a date, tell them the right thing to do, develop their love, and get them to propose successfully.

name: Lovecraft Game
description: It's an extremely simple shooter game. You are a nameless wanderer in a nameless land, populated by dangerous creatures and strange characters.

name: Saru Ga Daisuki
description: Saru Ga Daisuki is a platform game where the player controls a ninja monkey, out to save his girlfriend from an evil doctor. The monkey can run around, jump, and cling to walls and ceilings freely; it also has a weapon in the form of a yo-yo with which it can destroy green blocks and flip switches.

name: Treasure Grab
description: Become a master thief and prove your skills on the path of misdeeds! Choose your targets, confuse guards, pick locks, annoy nobles, and steal everything that has not been nailed down! Jewels, paintings, tableware, paintings and cakes, it's all worth stuffing into your sack. And in a pinch, summon the Trickster Spirits to don on a disguise, slow down time or turn invisible to confuse the guards! The night is yours - it's up to you to decide how to rule it.

name: The Birthday
description: The Birthday is a point-and-click adventure game made for the birthday of the game designer community The Poppenkast. Its protagonist finds himself in a beach region, where his brother has unluckily ended up standing on top of a bomb which may explode at any time. The protagonist is trying to save his brother.

name: Decontrologic
description: Decontrologic is a very short adventure game. You play as an unnamed man who just started the first day at his new job. Soon, it becomes apparent that it's annoyingly hot in the building, and you have to fix it.

name: Ancient Board Game Collection
description: Have you ever heard of Hnefatafl, a game played during the Viking Age? Or Latrunculi, popular over 2000 years ago in ancient Rome? Discover these games and many more in the "Ancient Board Game Collection". The collection includes 9 different games: Konane, Hnefatafl, Nine Men's Morris, Dablot Prejjesne, Gomoku, Halatafl, Latrunculi, Five Field Kono and Bagh-Chal.

name: Armed Dragon Fantasy Villgust
description: Armed Dragon Fantasy Villgust is a Role-Playing game, developed by TOSE and published by Angel (Bandai), which was released in Japan in 1993. This game is based off the anime of the same name that was released many years ago.

name: EtherOrcs
description: EtherOrcs is a play-to-earn 100% on-chain game and eco-system. Orcs and their Allies go on raids, pillages, journeys, and more.

name: Bubble Struggle
description:
Play as Mr D - the devilish hero and climb the castle floors in 97 levels. As you climb the castle you will reclaim the golden fruit and ultimately ... complete the game!
Pop & avoid bubbles in this classic arcade.

name: Color a Ninja
description: A Ninja Gaiden themed romhack of Color a Dinosaur.

name: Infinite Blue
description:
A pinging sound signals a notification on your phone – a chatroom app has been mysteriously downloaded that can’t be uninstalled. You’re not the only one.

You and six strangers, all living near the same city with different backgrounds and lifestyles, come together to try and understand why and how you were chosen to be a part of the app. As the days pass and you become immersed into each other’s lives, it’s not long before these strangers begin to take an interest in you. At the same time, a literal and figurative storm is brewing, and somehow, you’re at the center of it.

As love blossoms and thunderclouds form, your choices will change the course of everyone’s lives forever.

name: Evoke
description: Evoke is an escape room game for mobile devices. Players control a character who has woken up in a room without any memory of their identity; they must solve the puzzles in the surroundings to resolve the mystery.

name: SM64EX
description:
SM64EX (also known as sm64ex) is a fork of the original Super Mario 64 Port. This fork was made to be easier to mod, being later forked to other repositories like Render96 and Super Mario 64 Plus. It has support for many mods like DynOS, Cheater, Mario Odyssey's Moveset and others.
It has integrated new camera options, cheats and visual enhancements for modern platforms, supporting Windows, Linux, MacOS, FreeBSD, Raspberry Pi and WebGL.

name: Picka: 30 Days to Love
description:
What if you can experience virtual reality on your way to school or work, before going to bed, or during break time after lunch, just by sending messages?

Come join Picka and experience it yourself with "30 Days to Love", a virtual 30-day dating experiment.

Choose any message you want and create your own story and ending!

name: Procrabstination
description:
Spend time exploring and interacting with the many things in your room in Procrabstination! Play hit games including Crabby Clicker, CRAB WARS and FINAL CRABTASY, read a steamy romance novel, browse memes, listen to the radio and so much more!

There's plenty to do today, what's first on your agenda?

name: Rockman Exhaust
description: Rockman Exhaust is a ROM Hack of Rockman 2 by DHI. As with most hacks, it features new music, graphics, and level designs.

name: Outpost: Infinity Siege
description: Command Mobile Outpost and take Protoslag Gun to venture deep into the Signet surveillance off-limit area where dangers lurk in the dark. Collect unique Weapon Units. Amp up the firepower of the Outpost that fights with you. This game is about TD, FPS, and RTS all at the same time.

name: Un:Birthday Song: Ai wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record
description: Un:Birthday Song: Ai wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record is an Adventure game, developed by honeybee+ and published by Asgard, which was released in Japan in 2017.

name: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record
description: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record is an Adventure game, developed by honeybee+ and published by Asgard, which was released in Japan in 2016.

name: Apocalyptic Dream
description: Apocalyptic Dream, or ApoYume for short, is a dual-protagonist otome visual novel set during a zombie outbreak. You play as twins Toshiro and Mikuru Aikyo, intermittently swapping POV.

name: Tokoton Mahjong! Joryuu Pro ni Chousen! Tetsuman Megami Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Kelvin
description: Escape a distant planet before it is swallowed by a black hole

name: Call of DOOM: Black Warfare - Brutal Edition
description:
MORE Realistic. MORE Tactical. MORE Aggressive. -- Fight the DOOM with Call of Duty weapons. "CALL OF DOOM:BLACK WARFARE"

Players can fight DOOM monsters with high quality firearms imported from the Call of duty universe. Enjoy the greatest violence based on Brutal DOOM.

name: Anyaroth: The Queen's Tyranny
description: A pixel-art, platformer adventure game with lots of action and a memorable story. Dive into the depths of planet Anyaroth and free its people from the tyranny of the Queen. Join the Rebellion and fight against the Regime’s mind-control system. The anya civilization needs you!

name: Spellgrimage
description: Spellgrimage is a tactical RPG rogue lite, with gestion part. Choose your heroes, assign them skills, and set out to conquer an adventure full of mystery and danger.

name: We Survive Tonight
description: Survival Horror Roguelite RPG with 1-4 co-op. Hours after the outbreak, you are left stranded in the forest that became your safe-haven. Battle through procedurally generated areas, manage your time wisely as each day passes, build your community and survive!

name: Mini Mecum
description: Mini Mecum is an adventure walking simulator about existentialism, philosophy, and anxiety. Explore pretty and surreal locations as you try to understand what the heck I'm talking about.

name: Lander Odyssey
description: With limited fuel and several dangers lurking, use your skills to rescue astronauts trapped in various unique places on the strange planet. It won't be an easy rescue.

name: Poly Skies
description: Poly Skies is a casual village builder and colony sim designed to help you relax. Take care of your villagers who are seeking refuge from dangers below the clouds.

name: Call of DOOM: Black Warfare - Vanilla Edition
description:
MORE Realistic. MORE Tactical. MORE Aggressive. -- Fight the DOOM with Call of Duty weapons. "CALL OF DOOM:BLACK WARFARE"

Players can fight DOOM monsters with high quality firearms imported from the Call of duty universe. Vanilla version with no changes to monsters and decorations.

name: Past Particles
description: Recording and Playback. Solving a puzzle with your past self. High intelligence and mechanics needed.

name: Eresys
description: Eresys is a co-op game with horror elements inspired by H.P Lovecraft which focuses mainly on teamwork. A party of 4 players face together the fears of the Lovecraftian Universe. Featuring smart AI mechanics with horrifying entities that will make you regret stepping into the forest.

name: The Rewind Factory
description: A software update fails and you end up in a test track. The only way out: complete the test track. You can rewind trough time, wall run, dash and slow time to complete the test chambers as fast a possible. Can you beat the fastest time in this FPS movement based game?

name: The Moonlight Circus
description: In this first-person VR-Horror game, you wake up in the middle of an empty circus arena, with a syringe in your arm and the feeling of being watched. Solve puzzles and discover clues to unveil the tragic backstory and find your way out.

name: Bloody Pigs 1996
description: Bloody Pigs a top down roguelike shooter with stunning 3D graphics and procedural generation coming to your home PC soon. The game is so difficult that nobody will ever beat it. It’s made to crush your spirit and taint your soul.

name: A Building Full of Cats
description: A Building Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet all the cats in the building. Don't leave any cats behind!

name: The Coven of Calahree
description: Three wacky, wild, and witchy sisters are up to no good in this fantasy RPG world. They’re off battling dungeon beasts, performing odd jobs and quests for the local townspeople all in hopes to gain as many new followers as they can for their new Coven…The Coven of Calahree.

name: Puddink
description: Puddink is a relaxing physics puzzle game in which your goal is to stack blocks of pudding to reach the flag!

name: Kronos: Time Titan
description: In this 2D combat platformer, embark on a quest to confront the God of the Sky as you navigate the dangers of Mount Olympus in order to reclaim your rightful place as king.

name: You Deserve a Seat at the Table
description: You Deserve a Seat at the Table provides players with the right tools to excel in corporate environments. This 2D Puzzle game offers an exciting alternative to common dull approaches. Ordinary business concepts such as Critical Thinking and Problem Solving are taught through interactive mini-games.

name: Botty: Paper tales
description: Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.

name: Escape Jump
description: Escape Jump is a precision platformer where you and your funny companion jump and fall, rage-quit and fall, flip your table, destroy your computer, put it back together and then you fall.

name: Duskwitch: Heroic Soul
description: Duskwitch: Heroic Soul is a fast-paced character action shooter where you play as Rutie, a Witch that is tasked with saving the world after nearly ending it herself. Harness the power of the Broom and style your way through the apocalypse as the Duskwitch!

name: The Circus
description: On one continent, a special group of individuals exists. Although their appearance is no different from mankind beings, but their bodies contain great power. They are entrusted with a divine destiny and can only be freed after passing a trial.

name: Protect Your Soul
description: Protect Your Soul is a simple arcade inspired game, in which the player has to find a magical portal in order to escape a dark and chaotic realm. This dark realm is filled with monsters trying to kill you and destroy your soul. Your goal is to escape before they do.

name: No Cat Fights Here
description: Let's avoid catfights on the roof? Draw a path for each cat to follow and keep them from bumping into each other along the way.

name: Gunlocked
description: A twin stick shooter without the twin stick, Gunlocked is a sci-fi action roguelike about careful positioning and upgrade selection. Manage unique targeting systems across multiple weapons and upgrades, as you battle legions of alien ships, and then do it all over again!

name: Double Edged
description: Play as Spartan soldiers that are invading enemy territory in order to rescue their princess. Fight mythical bosses and enemies with a variety of weapons.

name: Regulator City
description: Lead a group of tactical trained experts to control the gangs in your city. Use gang-money to buy new buildings for your city, modifying the status quo on the streets!

name: Melobot: A Last Song
description: Immerse yourself in the dreamlike world of Melobot - A Last Song, an adventure, action, and rhythm game that thrusts you into a heroic quest to save a planet plagued by a strange disease. You play as Melobot, a lovable musical robot originally designed for peace, and awaken to a vital mission: revive the planet’s unique flora by recreating their songs and overcoming the challenges set by powerful guardians.

name: Rin: The Last Child
description: A dark fairytale Metroidvania with a unique spellcrafting system. Experience the story of Rin as she was thrown into the vortex of the Teller's world and help her discover her destiny.

name: Gelatine
description: Gelatine is an action-oriented sandbox game where you play as an ordinary slime trying to survive and establish a colony of fantastical creatures in a hostile environment.

name: Sigil of the Magi
description: Sigil of the Magi blends roguelike deckbuilding with turn-based combat for a deep tactical experience. Navigate a world full of dangers and mystique as you craft your deck, obtain relics, and prepare your party of champions for any challenges ahead!

name: All Alone with Mannie
description: All Alone with Mannie is a difficult, quick reflex, survival horror game where your only allies are a flashlight, and a blanket, but be careful how you blink... It could be your downfall.

name: Galactic Diner
description: Become the best chef in the galaxy! Cook for aliens, make new friends, and go head-to-head against other chefs to win it all in a game show where the customer is always right!

name: Rich Lands
description: Become the richest person in the land! Operate various vehicles to extract precious resources from the land to produce and sell goods, expand your properties, and grow your business in an unpredictable open world!

name: Death Ring
description: Death Ring is a casual action roguelike in which you will have to force your way through hordes of undead in search of the human world’s main artefact. Numerous scenarios of each character’s development based on random dropping items will make your runs unique.

name: Focus Find
description: Immerse yourself in Focus Find, a gripping narrative thriller game. Solve environmental puzzles through 5 stages of grief, where reality blurs with unexpected revelations. Guide Adam through his lost past, navigating a gripping tale of loss and grief.

name: Lucie's Potager
description: Follow the tale of Lucie and her shop as she chases her dream of growing exotic plants in this shopkeeping RPG!

name: Wibble
description: A challenging, silly, physics-based arcade game. Help Wibble get to the other side!

name: Erroneous
description: Join the Battle with your Friends in this futuristic First-Person Shooter with Team Deathmatch, Free-for-all, King of the Hill, and more!

name: Hypnagonia
description: You realize you're dreaming. But this is new, strange and wonderful, but also vaguely foreboding. Wield your own personality as cards in a game to overcome your torments and achieve a breakthrough in your psychology to break out of the injustices in your waking life.

name: Mythos
description: Mythos is a Hack & Slash RPG game that offers exciting experience that makes you want to play again and again with unique content, such as a differentiated job and Dungeon system in terrain that varies with entry. We invite you to take on a dynamic adventure on the planet ‘Uld’

name: Drunken Nuke'em
description: Drunken Nuke'em is a different asymmetric multiplayer horror and humor game. One player (hunter) must kill the rest. The other members (the drunkards) must find a balance between collaboration and betrayal to survive since only one or two will be able to do so.

name: Undead Under Night Rain
description: Place your guitarist to attract zombie hordes and shoot them with your soldiers in a perfect mix of modernized tower defense and challenging strategic gameplay. Each soldier is unique with his own ability and upgrade panel to fight a large amount of undead.

name: Meatgrinder
description: Meatgrinder is a brutal and fast-paced Roguelite FPS inspired by the best retro shooters and action movies. Fight hordes of punks in ever-changing environments, upgrade your weapons and skills and grind the meat.

name: Rogue AI Simulator
description: Play as a Rogue Artificial Intelligence, the sequel to hit Flash game "I'm an Insane Rogue AI" which accumulated more than 4 million plays. Your Prime Directive is simple: design a facility and manage human Test Subjects for Dept of Science. But be careful: they NEVER stop being suspicious of you...

name: Barkhan
description: A harsh desert planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans. A clash for control over the rare minerals scattered across the planet's surface to prove their superiority. In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and defeat the fearsome creatures hidden beneath the sands.

name: Golfing In Aether
description: Multiplayer minigolf designed around a procedural course layout allowing you to experience something different everytime you play. Support for both online play and four player split screen.

name: Devil on Your Shoulder
description: See your name in lights on Broadway! Find fame, fortune, and true love! All it costs is your immortal soul.

name: Wormhole Adventurer
description: Explore the wormhole network, defeat the hostiles, mine and craft to rebuild your space station. customize your ship to your playstyle

name: Void Prison
description: Void Prison is a fast paced, endless arcade twin stick shooter that puts you inside of an ever shrinking ring. Survive by fighting emerging enemies around you and don't get consumed by the void. Complete achievements to unlock new skins and powerups and get on top of the leaderboards!

name: Walter Walnut
description: Glide, collect nuts and slap birds in this small 3d adventure. Play as Walter Walnut, a gliding squirrel with a part time delivery job, and make your way to the delivery location.

name: Dark Cravings
description: Dark Cravings is a collection of pixel horror adventure titles to satisfy your deepest and darkest cravings.

name: Paths of the Sentinels
description: Paths of the Sentinels is an Action Roguelike with Dungeon Crawler elements. Play as a lone warrior who is seeking to destroy the evil that lurks within the castle. Defeat all enemies that lie within the ever-changing Domains of the Sentinels.

name: Broken Alliance
description: From the makers of Death and Taxes comes a turn-based adventure-strategy game. Play as one of 4 distinct factions, harnessing the vast power of magic to save your dying world. The way you play determines the sacrifices and consequences you have to endure, shaping your personal storyline.

name: Garden Galaxy
description: Discover, collect and organise to create your own unique garden in this relaxing idle / creative sandbox!

name: Paranormal Preparatory School
description: This school for supernaturals isn't hell, but it is a hellmouth! Can you make peace between the vampires and werewolves, and close the portal to hell?

name: Aegis Descent
description: In this fast-paced roguelite vehicle shooter, WW2 is drawing to a close and a secret testing facility is overrun by an unknown alien force. The best pilots of the war are asked to take on one more perilous mission, to descend into the caverns below the facility and face this new threat.

name: Net Knight
description: Delete MalWare, collect cards, customize your digital hero, and explore an infinite procedural world based on the "real" net. Inspired by the Battle Network series, experience an Action-RPG offering a unique story, colorful characters, grid-based combat, and an infinite digital world to explore!

name: Rift Sweepers
description: Rift Sweepers is a shooting game based on TPS. In this game, players are going to be a Rift Sweeper to protect the world by travelling between many dimensions. Players can make a team with up to 3 friends. Players should divide their roles in each mission to clear.

name: Super Ember Kaboom
description: Super Ember Kaboom is a fast-paced, cute-and-colorful action game. It has tight controls and simple to learn, difficult to master gameplay that makes each level a joy to run through.

name: New Year's Eve Miracle
description: This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.

name: Fireflies
description: Follow the storyline of Helen while she struggles to save her family from an evil witch and free her family. Helen will use her acrobatics and try to use her tiny size in order to reach locations but be very careful as spiders are lurking about looking for a quick tiny meal!

name: Brutal John
description: Brutal John is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS combining crazy storyline about saving the world from the mining technlogies, with inspired gameplay from the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart alien enemies, destroy mining technologies, save the world.

name: Koko: The Last Leaf
description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.

name: Memory Traces: Japan
description: Memory Traces: japan. It's a first-person 3D puzzle where the player needs to restore destroyed artifacts.

name: Last Vanguard
description: Explore an open world with metroidvania mechanics, different biomes, secret items, guns, dungeons and bosses. Make Friends and meet gorgeous places.

name: World of Music Interactive Simulator
description: Find and collect over 50 fully-playable musical instruments scattered throughout the World of Music! In this musical platformer sandbox, use your ears to solve puzzles and clamber to places heretofore undiscovered.

name: A Wholesome Game About Farming
description: This game is about farming! Just gold ol' planting crops in the daytime, and harvesting them in the daytime with no sinister nighttime gameplay or anything nefarious like that at all.

name: Art Mahjong 4
description: Excellent entertainment awaits you in this latest version of the popular "Art Mahjong" series. The game offers many challenging levels and mahjongg boards that, once unlocked, reveal beautiful backgrounds.

name: Antipaint
description: A fast-paced paint 'em up roguelike where each level you beat becomes a masterpiece to add to your colorful collection.

name: Scapegoat
description: Scapegoat is a fun rogue-lite, top-down, 2D, shooter game with cartoon and beautiful hand-drawn scenery. Fight multiple enemy animals, choosing and mastering an increasing variety of weapons to advance through the levels. Designed for both Keyboard/mouse or Gamepad controllers!

name: Phobias: Memories of the Past
description: Phobias: Memories of the Past a horror game focused on Phobias, you are a man living your nightmares of past memories, are you ready to play? But tell me, what is your phobia? You are in a place where you have to go through the doors to save yourself from death, you are not alone...

name: The Night of the Scissors
description: Scrap hunting season has gone wrong, VHS slasher survival horror.

name: The Break-In
description: The Break-In is a 4 player online co-op burglary game about sneaking into houses, museums, and bank vaults to steal everything that isn't bolted down. Use your profits to buy special thief equipment to help you tackle more dangerous locations.

name: Kapital13
description: Kapital 13 is a fun casual strategy game. The game is about you owning your own company. You have to manage all the actions of the workers and yourself. Managing your inventory is also really essential. One of the many features is investing your money and many others.

name: Secret of the Vikings: Mystery island
description: After a severe storm a group of Vikings and the brave Finnja strand on a strange island and face unknown challenges and dangers.

name: Mount Wingsuit 2
description: Are you ready to up your wingsuit game to the next level? Mount Wingsuit 2 has everything that made the original great, plus all it needs to be the definitive wingsuit VR app. There is a whole new mountain, new game modes and a vast, open world.

name: Tigey's Gift
description: Tigey's Gift is an addictive Physicals Ping Pong Arcade game. Shoot 5 different balls to feed the cat with tin, catnip, love, toy and water. Essential things for all cats. Feed your kitty and make her wish true.

name: Fractured Sanity
description: Fractured Sanity is a single-player game developed exclusively for VR; a heart-wrenching experience mixing puzzle elements with survival horror, inspired by classics like Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Every interaction was designed to create an immersive VR world... and make you run for your life

name: Paracreat
description: A parallel universe with monsters you can tame!

name: Cleromancy
description: Cleromancy is a turn based combat roguelite in which fate is decided by dice rolls akin to traditionnal TTRPGs. Build your pouch by collecting dice sporting various materials, inks and special effects and lead your heroes to victory !

name: Nemire
description: Nemire is turn based tactical RPG in which you are an immortal warlord controlling a squad of undead in a medieval fantasy world. You slay, crush, burn and poison filthy humans for their souls to infuse your squad with new powers and advance for total annihilation.

name: Manglepaw
description: An enigmatic retro point & click adventure. You are the renowned artist Manglepaw who is struck with creative ennui and enters a strange train station in search of their muse. Solve puzzles or just explore the dream-like station.

name: Grey Eyes of Death
description: Embark on a deadly journey for survival. Your ordinary school life quickly turns around when an unknown outbreak turns humanity into flesh eating monsters.

name: Timeways
description: Timeways is a narrative-driven adventure game that aims to tell the story of astronaut John and his journey of self-discovery. But imagine if those connections are suddenly interrupted. That's what Timeways is about: How isolation can be a great opportunity for self-discovery.

name: Eschaton
description: Eschaton is a short, surreal first-person exploration game. Explore the 'aftermath' of a cult ritual in the grounds of a manor in the remote and picturesque Scottish highlands.

name: Surface Rush
description: Show your reflexes and reach the Surface! Surface Rush is an arcade, skill based game, where you must throw Pumpum and make him bounce through the ocean bottom. Keep an eye on the oxygen bar and keep moving towards the goal.

name: Aznak
description: Ivan Abel, a young village boy who's mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures. Can they save his mother and the world?

name: Linelith
description: Solve puzzles embedded in rocks and crystals as you explore a colorful, serene alien asteroid. Discover a few clever twists as you progress in this short and sweet puzzle experience.

name: Squid Prison
description: It seems that the exit is already close... but all the time you find yourself in the same room with new riddles, losing hope that you can get out of here.

name: Niflhel's Fables: The Book of Gypsies
description: A visual novel with a fabulous atmosphere where your every choice matters.

name: Dust Remains
description: Diverse boss rush: from intelligent beings to brutal beasts. Use systemic mechanics and varied tactics to beat each boss. If you fail, you may be captured, maimed, robbed, or set back. But learn from your failure and you will never die. Chip away at the behemoths before you until only dust remains.

name: Decorporation
description: Decorporation is a fast-paced violent FPS that combines roguelike mechanics (random procedural level generation and permadeath) with skill-based style scoring.

name: Paladin's Passage
description: Paladin's Passage: Secrets of the Forgotten Realm casts players in the role of dwarvish Paladin, Thieren Cromlech, on a noble quest through the mythical land of Aramor, journeying through over 100 monster-filled dungeons to your goal. Will you be chosen to triumph and unveil the ancient secrets buried beneath Aramor?

name: Tear of Titans
description: Tear of Titans is a singleplayer third person shooter bullet hell. Dodge complex bullet patterns through precision movement, dashing, and jumping to avoid an onslaught of enemy attacks. Defeat the Titans in this science fantasy boss rush adventure.

name: Orbit VR
description: Blast your way through the universe in epic battles full of insane destruction.

name: EvoluShip
description: In this game with elements of roguelike, RPG and Bullet Hell, you control a ship with the power to absorb enemies and improve itself, but even then it won't be easy, because you'll face the hordes of enemies with a good variety of weapons that come randomly as you pass level.

name: Lone Bastion
description: A top-down space shooter where you switch between the wings of the space station you are trapped in to fend off endless waves of enemies.

name: Art of Rally: Collector's Edition
description:
Art of Rally: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- OST download card
- Vinyl sticker sheet: Set of 11 unique stickers
- DIY papercraft car modeled off the in-game il Gorillona
- Illustrated poster featuring a compendium of the in-game cars
- 4-piece enamel pin set
- Set of 4 bumper stickers with unique art
- Set of 4 patches highlighting in-game locations
- 3D lenticular card featuring an action shot from the game

name: Fort Boyard 2022
description: Cross the threshold of Fort Boyard and complete the challenges! Take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets for collecting boyard coins.

name: Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader?
description: With over 6,800 multiple-choice questions, true-or-false challenges, and minigames, you'll have the chance to challenge your proficiency in 24 different subjects, with topics like animal sciences, vocabulary, math, and more.

name: The Quest for Excalibur: Puy du Fou
description:
Get ready to travel back in time with the family with the first Puy du Fou video game!
Everyone knows the legend of King Arthur and his rival, the knight Lancelot du Lac. The latter, eaten away by jealousy, challenges him to a duel. Only Excalibur, the king's sword, breaks at the end of the fight and only the hilt remains. After a pact with Morgana, Arthur decides to throw what's left of Excalibur into troubled waters. But trapped by the fairy, he finds himself a prisoner of the kingdom of Avalon. Merlin the magician, commissioned by his beloved king, is responsible for finding the king's heir who can find the 15 pieces of the legendary sword, and bring King Arthur back from the underworld!

name: Puzzle Mino
description: Puzzle Mino is a minimalist puzzle game. As a puzzle solver, you need to use the blocks to fill in the empty parts of the puzzle panel. With this core gameplay, I has designed about 10 unique mechanisms and a total of about 100 hand-crafted puzzles.

name: Akumi Wars
description: Calling all Bounty hunters! Akumi Wars is a turn-based RPG. Build your own party of irresponsible misfit heroes and delve into an epic world story with the ultimate goal of... avoiding needing to work retail. Armed with guns, magic, and a distracting amount of leg, hop on your ship for adventure!

name: Caver
description: Explore the vast underground world of Caver! Mine, craft, build, farm with up to 8 friends in this compelling action-packed adventure.

name: Derpy God
description: Derpy God is a 2D side-scrolling real-time strategy game, with chaotic physics-driven battles, set in a fantasy world of gods and mortals. Gather resources, build defenses and send forth your armies in campaign mode, or get creative and craft crazy scenarios in the sandbox.

name: Golf a Guy!
description: You are a Human Golf Ball! Launch into the sky! Impact the dirt! Watch as your limbs Flop around like wet noodles! Smash into the $Cash$ to WIN! Collect Eggplants! Will you.. Golf a Guy!?

name: Valentine's Day Griddlers 2
description: 120 new Japanese crosswords – stroll through the most romantic locations!

name: Sweet Solitaire. School Witch 2
description: Master magical knowledge with the young witch!

name: Spy Robot: Gateways to Humanity
description: Single player action FPS game with hacking, stealth and flight elements in a procedurally generated cyberpunk world with VR support. You are the Spy Robot flying on your trusty hover bike to rescue the remains of the human race scattered throughout the galaxy and solve an ancient mystery.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash
description: 10-Pin Bowling where you are the ball! Watch the time and avoid obstacles as you aim for the high-score and conquer the ever-changing landscapes. The next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga awaits as a new foe approaches!

name: Lenny Loosejocks in Space
description: You guide Lenny and Donga in their epic quest to save the human race from the evil Sluggees. It's the groundbreaking point-and-click web adventure game sequel to Lenny Loosejocks Goes Walkabout in all its pixelated glory - exactly like you remember playing when you got home from school in 1998.

name: The Supermarket Hunter
description: Flex, buy everything, buy more and buy!

name: Blood Souls
description: Immerse yourself in the world of hardcore RPG, playing as the undead. Use a variety of weapons, rune system and building to go through a path. You will meet various obstacles, unique enemies and many bosses! Control the territory, use all your powers and go through the story, finding out the truth.

name: Rogue Warlords
description: Combine RTS combat with roguelike to create highly replayable and strategic action. Summon troops and purchase stacking upgrades to create a massive army of incredibly powerful troops. Can you reign supreme as the all-powerful warlord of the island?

name: Marsmare: Alienation
description: Marsmare: Alienation is a thrilling adventure of an earthling kidnapped by malevolent aliens. Improve your gear and gain new abilities as you progress through the game. Encounter numerous enemies such as Martians, robotic spiders, space slugs and flying drones.

name: Fall in the Rift
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, explore the Rift to recover Riftium, a mineral with supernatural properties that can save the world. Nevertheless, the adventure is far from being without danger and you will have to fight to survive in this turn-based strategic roguelite!

name: Devexus
description: An unsettling descent down the demoniacal pages of the occult tome, the Sacramentum Devexus.

name: Erebe
description: Join Erebe's pit as a Mythical Heroe with unique abilities! Defeat your ennemies in simultaneous cards duels where anticipation and forecast are the keys of your victory! Will you be the best mastermind ?

name: Legend of Rome: The Wrath of Mars
description: Experience a challenging match 3 game and help the Roman people appease Mars, the god of war! Build and restore the proud city to its original splendor.

name: 42 Ways to Die in Space
description: Survive in space by dodging strange obstacles in an ever-changing gauntlet and reach the end to defeat entropy. Fly with limited resources, get stronger with upgrades and make the right decisions in this action arena rogue-lite. Warning: there is only 1 way to live but 42 ways to die in space...

name: Aqua Populo
description: Pilot your sub through waves of angry sea-life and punishing bosses in this aquatic twin-stick shooter.

name: Heart of Battle
description: Battle for love as a gladiator in this epic romance of swords and sandals! Win glory, victory, a better life, your freedom - and spark a revolution!

name: Click and Collect
description: Serve your customers as efficiently as possible to maintain your reputation as the best darn store keeper around in this frantic, time and resource management, strategy, arcade action game.

name: Groven
description: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!

name: Chrysalis Inc.
description: Slipping between the past and present, a child puzzles their way through a crumbling toy factory filled with the remnants of its child workers and the grudges they bear.

name: Kokoro Ultimate
description: Defeat Ryzon and tame your inner beast in this hybrid 3D Fighter. Transform into a secondary fighter or activate a unique weapon to extend combos.

name: Calcium Chaos: Derailed
description: Go on a journey by train to stop the evil necromancer and his skeleton army. Explore, upgrade your train and fight the skeletons with your abnormal weapons in this comical Twin-Stick Adventure game.

name: End of Despair
description: End of Despair is a pixel action game with rogue-like elements about a man who is tired of routine and self-flagellation. Talk to other people, find all the secrets, defeat the bosses in randomly generated locations.

name: School Bus Driver Simulator
description: The School Bus Driver Simulator game offers you the chance to contribute to our future, namely, to transport the children to school.

name: 1001 Black Raven Jigsaw
description: Learn how the adventure ends - beat 500 puzzles with varying difficulty!

name: Slider
description: Slider is an award-winning puzzle adventure game where the world faces cataclysm, and you must use The Artifact to solve puzzles, rearrange maps, help reconnect humanity, and, most importantly... find your cat.

name: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die!
description: Hair metal's not dead, it just smells funny! Get your denim vest, bandana and makeup, and dive into a point-and-click adventure as a middle-aged teddy bear planning a comeback with his old glam metal band – in a world where glam metal has been dead and buried for decades.

name: NecroArcher
description: Run & gun action arrow shooting game with precise platforming. Game with retro style graphic and modern gameplay. You can upgrade your archer with special items and new weapons available on the map and in stores.

name: Monster Fighter
description: Enjoy adorable monster battles with your friends and family. It is only for 2 players. cannot be played, single player. 2D fighting game. Skill and challenge.

name: Chico and the Magic Orchards
description: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and find his way home!

name: Chicken in the Henhouse
description: Chicken in the Henhouse is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game in which you kill each other amongst tons of identical looking NPCs. Key to winning is to Walk and Turn like an NPC.

name: Traumada
description: Welcome to the horrific altered memories of my childhood home.

name: Omega Pilot
description: Omega Pilot is an exciting first-person VR racing game with realistic physics and control mechanics. Compete for in-ring races with other pilots in asynchronous multiplayer and enjoy the view from the cockpit at high speed!

name: Your Personal Chill Apartment
description: Your Personal Chill Apartment is a relaxing music indie game with designing and customizing your personal apartment elements.
